author: Christopher Mims
title: Paper Planners to Help You Stay Away From Screens
description: As life gets even more oppressively digital, these analog organizers can save the day—or at least help you remember whether it’s Monday
content:
LIKE SOME 4 BILLION other souls on the planet, Ive been holed up for a month at home, where I frequently wonder aloud to my empty apartment, What day is it again?
The distinction between a Thursday and a Saturday blurred dramatically when many aspects of dai… [+271 chars]
